:orphan:

Gallery of Examples of UMAP usage
---------------------------------

A small gallery collection examples of UMAP usage. Do you
have an interesting UMAP plot that uses publicly available
data? Submit a pull request to have it added as an example!


.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbnails">


.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbcontainer" tooltip="A simple example demonstrating how to use UMAP on a larger dataset such as MNIST. We first pull...">

  .. image:: /auto_examples/images/thumb/sphx_glr_plot_mnist_example_thumb.png
    :alt:

  :ref:`sphx_glr_auto_examples_plot_mnist_example.py`

.. raw:: html

      <div class="sphx-glr-thumbnail-title">UMAP on the MNIST Digits dataset</div>
    </div>
